settings.subtitle: Chums
settings.title: Fishing Division
settings.text: Chums was born on the water and over the past 35 years you can find us on every river in every corner of this great country. If you spend your weekends chasing fish and your weeks dreaming about it then you’re our kind of people!

settings.caption: 25 stylish clothing pieces that’ll help you look and feel like a million bucks

settings.title: How do you ship?
settings.text:
Free shipping for all orders over $15

For standard orders we use USPS as our default shipping service, but you can also choose from faster options if you're in a rush: 2nd Day Air and Next Day Air - available for orders placed Monday through Thursday before 2PM, Friday before 12PM Mountain Standard Time, holidays excluded.

Most standard orders are processed the day they are placed; orders placed on business holidays, on weekends, or after 2 p.m. Mountain Standard Time will be processed the following business day. All standard orders will be shipped within 2-5 business days.

Orders shipped 2nd Day and Next Day cannot be delivered to P.O. boxes.

settings.title: Do you ship internationally?
settings.text: Yes, we do ship internationally with an additional fee. Orders to Canada have a $10.00 shipping charge and all other international orders have a $40.00 shipping charge. We ship free to US military PO boxes.

settings.title: Can I place an expedited order?
settings.text: We offer overnight shipping and 2 day shipping within the continental US. We do not ship Saturday and Sunday. Please refer to our office and warehouse hours for more details.

settings.title: When will I receive my package?
settings.text: Once your order ships, you will be provided tracking information sent to your provided email address. Orders will be sent out the day after your order has been placed with USPS.

settings.title: Do we replace parts?
settings.text: We do not replace parts. However, we strive to meet our customers’ expectations 100%, and offer a lifetime warranty on a wide selection of our products. Please send us a photo of the defective product along with a valid shipping address and we will let you know if your product qualifies for a free replacement.

settings.title: Do we replace sunglasses?
settings.text: We do not guarantee that our products will always work on the vast array of sunglasses out there. We suggest testing our floating products in shallow water before use. Chums is not responsible for any loss due to misuse of products. However, we are happy to send you a replacement of your broken or damaged Chums.

settings.title: Will you replace any personal items ruined from water damage?
settings.text: No, most of our Storm Series products are constructed to withstand a quick dunking, not continued submersion. Furthermore, please double check if the item you are purchasing is water resistant before full submersion. We are not able to fulfill warranty or refund products that are not owned or sold by Chums.

settings.title: How many keys does the Key Quiver fit?
settings.text: The Key quiver can fit up to five keys that are 2 ½” long.

settings.title: Where are Chums products made?
settings.text: The majority of our products are made here, in the USA.

settings.title: Are your products Proposition 65 compliant?
settings.text: Chums is committed to providing safe, high quality products. We have worked with our vendors and our supply chain partners to ensure the purchase of raw materials and finished goods meet Prop 65 standards.

settings.title: My order is not going through/ how do I know my order was processed?
settings.text: We suggest using the web browser Google Chrome to place your order as our website seems to work best on this platform. Once your order is placed you should receive an email confirmation. If you do not receive one, feel free to contact us at cs@chums.com.

settings.title: Can I place an order over the phone?
settings.text: Yes! When you call us one of our friendly Customer Service Representatives will place your order and answer any questions or concerns you may have. Give us a call us at (800) 222-2486.

settings.title: What are your office hours?
settings.text: We are open Monday through Thursday from 8am to 5pm MST, Fridays from 8am to 3pm, Saturday and Sundays we are closed. Our office and warehouse hours are subject to change during holidays.

settings.title: Where can I buy Chums in person?
settings.text: Find a store near you with our store locator.

settings.title: Where is a Chums retail store?
settings.text:
You can purchase Chums at our warehouse locations in Salt Lake City and Hurricane, Utah.

Salt Lake City: 2424 S. 2570 W. SLC, UT 84119

Hurricane: 104 South Main Street Hurricane, UT 84737

settings.title: Contact US
settings.text:
Chums prides itself in providing exemplary customer service. Complete customer satisfaction is our foremost goal. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to call or email us. 

Contact our customer service team to help you with any issues.

cs@chums.com
2424 South 2570 West
Salt Lake City, UT 84119
877.665.2272
PR & MEDIA INQUIRIES - james@chums.com

settings.title: BORN ON THE RIVER
settings.text: Chums has a long and storied history on the water. In 1983 Chums inventor Mike Taggett was tired of watching his customer lose their sunglasses to the bottom of the Colorado River. This is where the idea for the Original Cotton Chums was born. Living in the back of a VW van is a $60 sewing machine Taggett started producing the first round of Chums.

settings.title: FAMILY RAN COMPANY
settings.text: In 2002 Chuck Ferries purchased Chums in partnership with his son and son-in-law. For the past 18 years the Ferries family has continued to push innovation through product development, instilled a commitment to American-made manufacturing (out of the company’s Hurricane, UT manufacturing facility), and embedded an unwavering passion for unbeatable customer service, helping Chums became the global brand we know and love today.

settings.text_1: Camber Outdoors is the hub for advancing career opportunities, leadership and entrepreneurship to inspire an outdoors, truly for everyone.
settings.text_2: The mission of American Rivers is to protect wild rivers, restore damaged rivers and conserve clean water for people and nature.
settings.text_3: Made up of concerned citizens throughout the nation who share the common goal of preserving Utah’s remaining desert wild lands, known collectively as America’s redrock wilderness.

settings.subtitle: Homegrown in Hurricane
settings.title: Made in the USA
settings.text: Chums manufactures over 15,000 units a day in our Hurricane, Utah facility. Chums employs more than 75 employees between our Hurricane, Salt Lake City and Sun Valley offices

Chums' guiding principle is simple: We believe in acting responsibly and ethically in all aspects of our business. We support green initiatives and buy power using Blue Sky Renewable Energy. All our cardboard, aluminum, paper and plastic are recycled. Incoming and outgoing shipments are bulk packed using minimum of filler and cartons. Catalogs, flyers and brochures are printed on recycled paper, and we hope this website can reduce their use! Local manufacturing also reduces transportation, lowering our carbon footprint.

Employees work flex time to make time for their families and community. This also helps Chums lower peak power demand and reduce carbon emissions. Some employees bike to work; it's a great green excuse to ride more! Our goal is to continue to act responsibly and ethically at work, within our community, and to our planet.

settings.subtitle: Our Values
settings.title: Affordable Quality
settings.text: Chums is dedicated to manufacturing and delivering the highest quality outdoor accessories at an affordable price, always.

settings.subtitle: Our Values
settings.title: Passionate about the Outdoors
settings.text: Chums was born outdoors on the water. The outdoors (and the water) is the cornerstone of the brand and continues to inspire all our product creations. Chums is dedicated to those who seek to fill their lives with an endless pursuit of outdoor adventure.

settings.subtitle: Our Values
settings.title: Innovative
settings.text: Every day, every trip outdoors, and every problem is an opportunity for a better solution. Chums is relentlessly dedicated to continued innovation and creating better solutions to age-old outdoor problems.

settings.subtitle: Our Values
settings.title: Dedicated to Customer Service
settings.text: Since day one, Chums committed itself to superior customer service and strong business practices. At Chums, you’ll always receive an answer from an outstanding member of our customer service team, and we’ll always put the needs of our clients and customers first – striving for nothing short of perfection.

settings.title: Join the Crew
settings.text:
At Chums we are lucky enough to work in an environment that allows us to explore our shared passion for the outdoors. Chums has been the outdoor industry leader in manufacturing innovative accessories for three decades. Each year we continue to grow by translating our passion for all things outdoor into creating the best and most versatile accessories on the planet. If you value a casual, team-oriented atmosphere, have a down to earth approach, and possess a drive to innovate, Chums may be the place for you.

If there is no position listed at the moment that aligns directly with your skill set and experience, please check back frequently and feel free to email your up-to-date resume and cover letter to: jobs@chums.com.

settings.title:
Customize your
Product
settings.subheading: Customized products promote your business, shop or cause

settings.text:
You can imprint or resin dome many of our great Chums products with your logo in three easy steps:

1 Send vector artwork (Illustrator or EPS vector files) to cs@chums.com
2 Approve virtual artwork sample
3 Order—it’s that easy!

settings.text_1: One-color screen printing, available on a wide variety of products. Lead times as short as 2 weeks after art approval with minimums as low as 50 pieces
settings.text_2: Eye-catching full color 3D dome, available on a wide variety of products. Lead times as short as 2 weeks after art approval with minimums as low as 50 pieces

settings.text: We're stoked that you want to be part of the Chums Pro Team. This is a select team of Guide, Industry Professionals and just rad individuals that we are recruiting to help spread the word about Chums. Fill out our application and let's work together.

settings.title: Easy as 1-2-3
settings.text:
1. Apply to become a Chums Pro

2. Get a free pair of PRO Series Chums

3. Get a lifetime 30% code

Chums Pro discount is for your personal use only and should not be shared with anyone else. Purchasing for others or for resale is strictly prohibited.We reserve the right to revoke or terminate anyone’s Pro status, at any time. Discounts received from inclusion to the Pro Program may not be combined with any other discounts or promotions except where noted.

settings.title: Keep it Wild, Keep it Free
settings.text: Chums is committed to preserving wild places so that future generations can keep making memories, creating relationships and experiencing adventure on the river. Everyone is impacted by a wild river, whether on a large or small scale. We invite our Chums community to celebrate our anniversary by paying it forward to what inspired Chums in the first place — the river.

settings.title: Marketing Designer
settings.objective: The Marketing Designer coordinates and implements marketing communication projects. Marketing designer creates and develops brand awareness through digital design content, including websites, social media, email and other marketing materials.
settings.experience:
Bachelor’s degree in Graphic Design or related field from an accredited college or
technical school; or equivalent combination or experience & education
settings.responsibilities: Create customer engagement campaign themes/concepts and effectively communicate our marketing campaigns digitally across multiple platforms. Collaborate with Chums Marketing and Design teams to create design assets.digitally across multiple platforms

settings.title: Inventory Control Supervisor
settings.objective:
The Inventory Control Supervisor is responsible for maintaining control of all inventory items.
They enter data on product in house and those shipped to other warehouses (BTX) into our
database. He/she must monitor and supervise inventory levels and resolve quantity
discrepancies, and make quantity reports as needed.
settings.experience: High School diploma or equivalent; Intermediate computer skills; Working knowledge of Microsoft suite and Google Docs.
settings.responsibilities: Create customer engagement campaign themes/concepts and effectively communicate our marketing campaigns.digitally across multiple platforms

settings.title: Warehouse Operations Manager
settings.objective: Chums Inc., located in Salt Lake City, UT, is looking for Warehouse Operaitons Manager to manage all warehouse activities and is ultimately responsible for the smooth and efficient operation of the warehouse. Departments under the WOM’s direction and scope of responsibility are Order Fulfillment, Receiving, Customization, Work Cell, FG & RM Inventory, and Logistics. This position will communicate with all departments/divisions, ensure the accurate and timely processing of all goods/materials both shipped from and received into the facility, work directly with and provide support for the Logistics Coordinator, Order Fulfillment supervisor, Work Cell and Customization supervisors, reports directly to the COO and is accountable to peer management team. In a nutshell the WOM is a putter-outer of fires, a provider of rapid response answers, and a proactive team development and efficiencies guru.
settings.experience: Bachelor’s degree/equivalent experience; Must be able to read and write English fluently; Experience with and working knowledge of operations and management concepts, practices and procedures; Ability to write documents such as safety rules, SOPs, procedure manuals, sales orders, & shipping documents.
settings.responsibilities: Ultimately responsible for the accuracy, quality, and timeliness of all orders/materials leaving or entering facility; Provide training, direction, motivation and support for the logistics coordinator, the customization, order fulfillment, and work cell supervisors and other direct reports; Manages and schedules both cyclic and annual inventory for facility; Effectively communicates with all other departments/divisions; Ensures all warehouse functions are attended to within set safety standards.

settings.title: Customer Service Rep
settings.objective: The CS Rep is primary responsible is to provide an effective, quality driven, in-house support system for the Sales Team; utilizing in-depth knowledge of customer service best practices, company product, and programs to take and process sales orders, engage with both customers and sales reps, and collaborate/coordinate with internal departments to offer our customers a superior experience.
settings.experience:
•Associate’s degree or 1-3 years of customer service experience.

•Mastery of professional telephone and interpersonal etiquette.
•Excellent communication skills both written and verbal.
•Knowledge of current customer service best practices and methodologies.
•Strong computer skills, including Microsoft office, excel, power point, & a variety of EDI platforms.
•Ability to manage projects and time effectively, working within and exceeding deadlines.
•Results driven and proactive, strong desire to own and execute area of responsibility with excellence.
•Demonstrate ability to work well within a team and across departments.
•Must be able to read and write English fluently.
•Intermediate math ability to calculate percentages/margins/etc as it pertains to sales.
•Insane attention to detail
•Must be extremely organized.
•Punctual and dependable.
•Customer service driven.
•Work independently a well as within a team.
•Adaptability/flexibility to change as company requires.
settings.responsibilities:
•Provide timely and accurate information to incoming customer inquiries/orders.
•Provide timely & creative solutions to dealer/customer challenges.
•Develop and maintain positive relationships with dealers, customers, and sales team.
•Stay up to date on company ERP system information and module updates.
•Process customer orders/changes/returns according to established departmental policies.
•Provide timely feedback to the company regarding service failures/customer concerns and make recommendations as to solution based on company policy, practice, and creativity.
•Maintain current and accurate customer information within company ERP system.
•Assist sales reps to meet and exceed customer’s service expectations.
•Maintain positive communication with assigned area sales reps.
•Communicate product, program, and sales information to customers.
•Process customer requests for credit based on established company policies.
•Support sales team by attending trade shows, events, and participating in all internal sales efforts.
•Assist with other various duties assigned.

settings.title: Graphic Designer
settings.objective: Chums Inc. is looking for a Graphic Designer to work in our Ketchum, Idaho office. This position is responsible for the accurate and timely completion of graphic design work for Chums as directed by the Marketing Director. This person will work collaboratively with other members of the Chums team to fulfill the artistic and graphic needs of each department.
settings.experience: Bachelor’s degree in Graphic Design or related field from an accredited college or technical school; or equivalent combination or experience & education; Excellent Computer skills and mastery of Adobe Creative Suite and image processing; Functioning knowledge of Microsoft Office products; Working knowledge of HTML, CSS, and common web design practices helpful.
settings.responsibilities: Produce catalog, sales materials and tradeshow graphics on time; Produce digital design requests (emails, social and website assets); Manage website including adding new products; Produce visual concepts and finished designs as requested; See PDF for more complete details.

settings.title: Order Fulfillment specialist
settings.objective: The Order Fulfillment Specialist is responsible for accurately picking, pulling, & packing product orders  in a timely fashion and in accordance with company and customer guidelines.
settings.experience:
High School diploma/equivalent.
Must be able to read and write English fluently.
Ability to interpret documents such as safety rules, procedure manuals, sales orders, & shipping documents.
Basic math (addition/subtraction/multiplication/division).
Ability to manage projects and time effectively.
Demonstrate ability to work well within a team and across departments.
See additional info in PDF.
settings.responsibilities:
Ensure orders are pulled and packed accurately and on time.

Accurately reads customer orders, works orders, shipping orders, or requisitions to determine item to be moved, gathered, or shipped.
Generate appropriate label/sticker and apply to product as per picking sheet/customer order
Learn and know products intimately, must be able to recognize not only sku #s but products.
Assembles customer orders from stock and readies for shipment.
See additional info in PDF.

settings.title: Reception
settings.objective: Chums Inc., located in Salt Lake City, UT, is looking for ...
settings.experience:
Minimum of high school diploma/equivalent. Minimum of 1 year customer service or reception experience.
· Excellent computer skills.
· Standard office equipment operation.
· Basic Math.
settings.responsibilities:
· Greets and directs visitors

· Answers multiline phone and directs caller to the appropriate party or voicemail.
· Receives and distributes messages and call back information for various personnel.
· Collaborates and problem solves with coworkers and manager.
· Receives, sorts, and forwards incoming mail.
· Mails outgoing parcels and invoices digitally across multiple platforms.
· See PDF for additional responsibilities.

settings.no_open_position_text: Sorry, there are currently no open positions at Chums.

settings.subtitle: Chums
settings.title: Paddling Division
settings.text: Chums were created by a Raft Guide who was sick of losing endless pairs of sunglasses to the Colorado River. Now, more than 35 years later we're still on the river in the same place it all started, helping Rafting Guides save their sunglasses and River Rats keep their gear dry.

settings.subtitle: Chums
settings.title: Exploring Division
settings.text: Pair large text with a full-width image to draw attention to an important detail of your brand or product line.

settings.event: Mike Taggett the founder of Chums hitchhikes to Utah to become a river guide
Chumley the finest golden Lab and namesake of the company
Mike sews the first retainer
Chums Original Retainer is born
Chums & Swatch, Swatch places the first order with Chums leading to mass production
Booby Bird, the blue-footed booby bird is adopted as the Chums mascot
The Red-Footed Booby Bird takes his spot as the face of Chums
JERCS, Just an Eyewear Retention and Comfort System
Chums retail store opens on Main Street in Hurricane Utah
Chums Safety, Chums enters the safety market with breakaway retainer and accessories
Portland Oregon, Chums sales and design office opens in Oregon
Landwell Inc. & Chums crosses the Pacific to be distributed in Japan
Chuck Ferries, The Ferries Family purchases Chums
Universal Fit, Chums continues to revolutionize the fit and function of the eyewear retainer
Hang with you Chums, The Booby Bird gets a buddy
Salt Lake City Utah, Chums expands operations, merges with Chisco and opens office in Salt Lake City
Landwell open the first Chums retail store in Tokyo, Japan.
Beyond Coastal, Chums expands with the purchase of beyond coastal
Chums Asia, Chums enters China with the Shanghai Birds Nest
Chums 30th Anniversary, Helping you hang on Since 1983.
Chums adds silicone retainers to their product line
Chums roll out their first accessory case
Chums continues to innovate with in house sublimation
Sun Valley Idaho, Chums opens new office in Sun Valley Idaho
Chums continues to manufacture thousands of units a day in our original factory

settings.subtitle: HOMEGROWN IN HURRICANE
settings.title: MADE IN THE USA
settings.text: Chums manufactures over 15,000 units a day in our Hurricane, Utah facility. Chums employs more than 75 employees between our Hurricane, Salt Lake City and Sun Valley offices

settings.title: Chums Today
settings.text:
We now have 3 offices, over 75 employees, a few of which have been with us for over 20 years.

Over the three decades we’ve been around, We’ve learned a thing or two, mostly how to have fun while still getting after it and we pride ourselves in having a team filled with the raddest, most talented people in the industry.
